tiles.name: sagebrush_plains_north
tiles.description: Expansive plains covered in hardy sagebrush, stretching northward, offering limited resources for the avian clans.

tiles.name: redrock_canyon_west
tiles.description: A deep canyon carved into red sandstone, providing shelter but also potential ambush points for rival clans.

tiles.name: whispering_wind_pass
tiles.description: A mountain pass known for its strong, echoing winds, a strategic point for scouting and defense.

tiles.name: cactus_spine_ridge
tiles.description: A rugged ridge dotted with towering cacti, offering a vantage point over the scrubland.

tiles.name: old_avian_nesting_grounds
tiles.description: Abandoned nesting grounds of a once-thriving avian colony, now a haunted reminder of the past.

tiles.name: sunbaked_clay_flats
tiles.description: Vast, cracked clay flats baked by the sun, difficult terrain to traverse.

tiles.name: scrubland_clearing_central
tiles.description: The dusty Scrubland Clearing with the gnarled Joshua tree, a neutral meeting ground for avian clans, where Kira often seeks refuge.

tiles.name: crimsonwing_territory_east
tiles.description: The heart of the Crimsonwing clan's territory, known for its strategic advantage and diminishing resources.

tiles.name: elder_council_overlook
tiles.description: A high vantage point where the elder Crimsonwings traditionally hold council, resistant to change.

tiles.name: youth_gathering_rock
tiles.description: A secluded rock where the younger Crimsonwings gather, questioning tradition and seeking new solutions.

tiles.name: sagebrush_river_bed
tiles.description: A dry riverbed now only sparsely filled with water, a source of contention between avian clans.

tiles.name: harvest_canyon_trail
tiles.description: A narrow trail used for gathering scarce resources, often patrolled by Crimsonwings.

tiles.name: abandoned_water_cache
tiles.description: A forgotten water cache, a potential treasure trove or a dangerous trap.

tiles.name: thornbush_barrier
tiles.description: A dense barrier of thornbushes, hindering travel and providing cover.

tiles.name: shimmering_heat_oasis
tiles.description: A mirage-like oasis shimmering in the heat, often leading travelers astray.

tiles.name: broken_wing_memorial
tiles.description: A solemn memorial for fallen Crimsonwings, a place of reflection and remembrance.

tiles.name: ancient_song_stones
tiles.description: Ancient stones etched with ancestral songs, holding the history of the avian clans.

tiles.name: forgotten_feather_trail
tiles.description: A winding trail marked by scattered feathers, a path of a long-lost avian traveler.

tiles.name: canyon_echo_chamber
tiles.description: A natural echo chamber in the canyon, used for communication and rituals.

tiles.name: sky_watch_peak
tiles.description: The highest peak in the area, providing a panoramic view of the scrubland and city outskirts.

tiles.name: city_outskirts_west
tiles.description: The initial encroachment of the city, encroaching on the scrubland's edge.

tiles.name: precious_resource_mine
tiles.description: The city is built here around a precious resource that is now being strip mined.

tiles.name: resource_mine_access_road
tiles.description: The main route to the resource mine where a lot of the industry is moving.

tiles.name: dust_devil_ravine
tiles.description: A ravine notorious for its frequent dust devils, a dangerous place to linger.

tiles.name: scavenger_crow_territory
tiles.description: A territory dominated by crows, who live on scrap from the mines.

tiles.name: shady_hawk_perch
tiles.description: The best lookouts for hawk to strike at crows fighting over scrap.

tiles.name: hidden_tunnel_nest
tiles.description: A rare and hidden nest that provides shelter for many animals.

tiles.name: Joshua_tree_sanctuary
tiles.description: Ancient resting place of joshua trees that provides shade from the sun.

tiles.name: coyote_canyon_territory
tiles.description: Coyotes hunting and defending their family in the rocky canyon.

tiles.name: night_stalker_cave
tiles.description: A hidden cave for the animals of the night.

tiles.name: abandoned_trade_route
tiles.description: A forgotten route which once carried the most precious goods

tiles.name: shifting_sand_dunes
tiles.description: Impossible to traverse, a path of only sand and death.

tiles.name: scrubland_crossroads
tiles.description: Crossroads for the avian races, not always friendly.

tiles.name: abandoned_rail_line
tiles.description: Forgotten relic of a past race.

tiles.name: city_supply_route
tiles.description: The main route that supplies and keeps the city running.

tiles.name: dust_bowl_plains
tiles.description: A place where no life can grow due to the destruction and industry of the city.

tiles.name: mining_operation_site
tiles.description: This area is being blown up and destroyed for more resources.

tiles.name: city_resource_storage
tiles.description: A place where resource are stored from the mine.

tiles.name: refinery_processing_plant
tiles.description: Where the resources are being refined into usable material.

tiles.name: city_power_grid
tiles.description: Where the power to the city is being generated from.

tiles.name: eastern_city_gates

tiles.name: old_town_market

tiles.name: central_city_plaza
tiles.description: The city's center point and largest plaza.
